title: Add API endpoint for label configuration and use in Web UI
description:
The Web UI currently hardcodes strategic_types as ['milestone', 'epic']. This should be fetched from the backend API.

Backend work:
- Add GET /api/config/labels endpoint that returns LabelNamespaces (includes strategic_types)
- Ensure it reads from .jit/labels.json

Frontend work:  
- Add apiClient.getConfig() or apiClient.getLabelConfig() method
- Fetch config on app initialization or when GraphView mounts
- Pass strategic_types to filterStrategicNodes() and createStrategicFilter()
- Remove DEFAULT_STRATEGIC_TYPES hardcoding

This allows repositories to customize which types are considered strategic without changing Web UI code.
